DOC.brief_summary: Study Aims : - To compare long-term efficacy safety imiquimod versus vehicle use adjunct cryotherapy . - To assess compare recurrence rate time recurrence 2 different treatment group . Hypothesis : The imiquimod arm produce prolong clear Actinic Keratoses ( AK ) compare vehicle arm .
DOC.brief_title: Study Imiquimod 5 % Cream Addition Cryotherapy Management Actinic Keratoses
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluation : ( ) topical imiquimod 5 % cream ( ii ) vehicle cream use two time weekly eight week start two week post cryotherapy . Study Aims : - To assess compare recurrence rate time recurrence 2 different treatment group . - To assess compare efficacy 2 different treatment group . - To assess compare safety 2 different treatment group . Study Design : 6 visit 62 week
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis actinic keratosis 4 discreet lesion face bald scalp . Lesions must within treatment area exceed 50 cm2 ( combined total must exceed 50 cm2 ) Women childbearing potential use appropriate contraceptive method Previous treatment imiquimod AK prescribe area within past 5 month cryosurgery area within past 4 week . Patients unwilling stay sun wear protective clothing use sunscreen minimum SPF 15 study . Basal squamous cell carcinoma prescribe treatment area past 2 year .
